title: Pixlyzer
shortDesc: Image toolkit for conversion, compression, resizing and batch operations.
fullDesc: A comprehensive image processing toolkit built with React frontend and Python backend. Features include format conversion, intelligent compression, batch processing, and advanced resizing algorithms. The application handles multiple image formats and provides a user-friendly interface for complex image operations.
challenges: Handling large file uploads and maintaining image quality during compression.

title: Bottleneck Calculator
shortDesc: Free tool to identify CPU/GPU bottlenecks across different resolutions.
fullDesc: An advanced bottleneck calculator that analyzes hardware compatibility across 1080p, 1440p, and 4K resolutions. Uses comprehensive performance databases and algorithms to predict potential bottlenecks and suggest optimal hardware combinations for gaming and productivity workflows.
challenges: Gathering accurate hardware performance data and creating reliable prediction algorithms.

title: MSDL
shortDesc: Access official Microsoft Windows versions directly.
fullDesc: A streamlined interface to access official, up-to-date, and legacy versions of Microsoft Windows operating systems. Provides direct download links without registration requirements, making it easier for developers and IT professionals to access Windows ISOs for legitimate purposes.
challenges: Maintaining up-to-date links and ensuring compatibility with Microsoft's changing APIs.

title: Portfolio v3
shortDesc: Modern portfolio website built with React and Tailwind.
fullDesc: A complete rebuild of my personal portfolio using modern web technologies. Features responsive design, smooth animations, dynamic content loading, and optimized performance. Built with accessibility and SEO in mind.
challenges: Migrating from vanilla HTML/CSS/JS while maintaining design consistency.

title: MinxLink
fullDesc: MinxLink is a powerful and modern URL shortener designed to make link management effortless. It allows users to create, manage, and track shortened URLs efficiently.
challenges: Balancing AI creativity with brand consistency and managing API costs.
